IN.IC: je edninska in množinska oblika samostalnika.

sense.def:
To barrack someone
pomeni na nekoga vpiti, da bi ga prekinili med govorom.

seg.quote: The Prime Minister was barracked as she offered her sympathy to the relatives.
The barracking was led by a bearded man in jeans.

sense.def:
A barracks
je poslopje ali skupina poslopij, kjer živijo in delajo člani oboroženih sil.
